long_description: Dependable Omega Pacific(R) rappel rings are essential for setting up quick bail-outs or rappel stations. Forged aluminum is anodized grey for less visual impact and is a mere 34g (1.2 oz.) in weight. Solid, seamless design yields incredible breaking strength of 20kN (4,496 lbs. of force). Not designed for repeated lowering or for use as a rappel device. Using an Omega Pacific rappel ring ensures your rope pulls free from the anchor; works with slings or chain anchors.
short_description: Dependable Omega Pacific(R) rappel rings are essential for setting up quick bail-outs or rappel stations.
